general.title: General
general.resend-verification-disabled-tooltip: Please allow few mintues to receive email verification.

email.title: E-mail
email.description: Change email associated with your account

change.title: Change Email Request
change.request-sent: Confirm e-mail to complete the request

two-step.title: Two-step verification
two-step.description: Require security code in addition to your password

recovery-codes.title: Recovery codes
recovery-codes.description: Get security codes to use when you can't access your phone

backup-codes.title: Backup codes
backup-codes.description: You can redeem these one time codes to access your account
backup-codes.no-codes: No back up codes left. Please generate new ones.

instructions.qr-code: Scan the QR Code or enter the following key into your two factor authenticator app such as Google Authenticator or Microsoft Authenticator. Spaces and casing do not matter
instructions.verification-code: Once you have scanned the QR code or entered the key above, your two factor authentication app will provide you with a unique code. Enter that code in the confirmation box below

last-step.title: Finished
last-step.information: Next time you log in you will be prompted to use two factor authentication
last-step.save-codes: Save below one time access codes in case you do not have access to your phone

password.title: Password
password.description: Your unique password used to protect your account

session.expired: Your session is expired and you are about to be signed out.
session.inactive: You are about to be signed out due to inactivity.

verification.email: You're email has been successfully updated
verification.error-description: Something went wrong during confirmation process...
verification.success-description: Your email has been confirmed, you may sign in now
verification.required: Please go to your email and verify your account

forgot-password.subheader: Enter your email address to reset your password.
forgot-password.message: If the provided e-mail is registered, you will receive an email from us shortly to reset your password.

sign-in.title: Sign in
sign-in.subheader: Sign in to view your account

sign-up.title: Create Account
sign-up.subheader: Sign up to create an account.

two-step-verification.subheader: Please enter verification code found on your authenticator app.
two-step-verification.use-recovery-codes-tooltip: Redeem recovery code to sign in

updated.message: You can now sign in using your new password

validations.min-length: Input field must be at least {requiredLength} characters long.

password.number: Password must have at least one digit ('0'-'9').
password.uppercase: Password must have at least one uppercase ('A'-'Z').
password.lowercase: Password must have at least one lowercase ('a'-'z').
password.min-length: Password must be at least {requiredLength} characters long.

features.angular-cli: A command line interface for Angular
features.bootstrap: Responsive layout from battle tested, world most famous UI library
features.cypress: Cypress is a next generation front end testing tool built for the modern web.
features.fontawesome: Easy to use vector icons and social logos

lazyloading.title: Lazy loading
lazyloading.description: Faster startup time with lazy loaded feature modules

features.ngxs: One way data flow powered by RxJS Observables
features.rxjs: Reactive programming with async collections using Observables
features.description: Flexible theming support for provided and custom components
features.themes.title: Themes
features.title: Features
features.typescript: Superior developer experience, code completion, refactoring and less bugs
